tiled.io
Interface MapWriter

All Superinterfaces:
java.io.FileFilter, PluggableMapIO
All Known Implementing Classes:
JSONMapWriter, LuaMapWriter, MappyMapWriter, RXDataWriter, TMWServerMapWriter, XMLMapWriter
public interface MapWriter
extends PluggableMapIO, java.io.FileFilter

Used by Tiled to denote a plugin for writing maps. The map file can have any format, as long as the MapWriter implementor accepts instances of Map and TileSet. $Id$
